Question
========
What is the recommended source for downloading the R installer to ensure you get the correct version?

Answerlist
----------
* The official R Project website (CRAN link)
* Any random download site that lists R
* A package manager from another programming language
* It comes preinstalled so no download is needed

Solution
========
Use the official R website (which links to CRAN) to download the installer so you get an up-to-date, unmodified version.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
